name: Tigra
text: Each minion with a copy of Hunted attached loses guard. On the Hunt — Response: After the player phase begins, draw 1 card for each minion engaged with you (to a maximum of 3).

name: Greer Nelson
text: Undercover Work — Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a copy of Hunted and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "You don't have to be an Avenger to protect others."

name: Moon Knight
text: Forced Response: After Moon Knight enters play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and put it into play engaged with you. Stun and confuse that minion.
flavor: "Hey, Greer, look what I found!"

name: Precinct HQ
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Precinct HQ → remove 1 threat from a scheme. Remove 1 additional threat for each minion engaged with you.
flavor: "Save your threats, mister. My friends are a lot scarier than yours." —Greer Nelson

name: Cat's Head Amulet
text: Resource: Exhaust Cat's Head Amulet → generate a [physical] resource for each minion engaged with you (to a maximum of [physical] [physical] [physical]).
flavor: Tigra's amulet allows her to change between her feline and human forms.

name: Sharp Claws
text: Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, exhaust Sharp Claws → Tigra gets +1 ATK for this attack. Choose: • This attack gains overkill. • This attack gains piercing.

name: Cat-Like Reflexes
text: Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, discard Cat-Like Reflexes → prevent 3 of that damage. You may confuse a minion engaged with you.

name: Hunted
text: [star] As an additional cost to play this upgrade, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and put it into play engaged with you. Attach Hunted to that minion and stun it. Interrupt: When attached minion is defeated, ready Tigra.

name: Tooth and Claw
text: Reduce the cost to play this event by 1 for each minion engaged with you. Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Deal 4 damage to an enemy.

name: Feline Senses
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, stun a minion.
flavor: "It's just instinct. This cat's got to hunt." —Tigra

name: Two-Gun Kid
text: [star] Interrupt: When Two-Gun Kid makes a basic attack, choose 2 enemies instead of 1 and resolve this attack against each of them.
flavor: "Alright fellas, say when."

name: Air Cover
text: Uses (2 fuel counters). Max 1 per player. Response: After a minion enters play, exhaust this card and remove 1 fuel counter from it → search your deck and discard pile for a [[Tactic]] upgrade that can be attached to that minion and add it to your hand.

name: Aggressive Conditioning
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
You get +3 hit points and your hero gets +1 ATK.

name: Coup de Grâce
text: Hero Action (attack): Defeat a non-[[Elite]] minion with an upgrade attached. Ignore any "When Defeated" abilities on that minion.
flavor: "I'm putting an end to this – right now!" —Black Knight

name: Savage Strike
text: Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, you get +6 ATK for this attack. This attack gains piercing.
flavor: KRACK!

name: Yellow Jacket
text: Play only if you have the [[Avenger]] trait. Response: After Yellow Jacket enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an upgrade and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I know what I have to do."

name: Hulkling
text: Chosen Shape — Forced Response: After a [[Shapeshift]] upgrade enters play under your control, discard each other [[Shapeshift]] upgrade you control and ready Hulkling.

name: Teddy Altman
text: You cannot have more than 1 [[Shapeshift]] upgrade in play. Shape-Changer — Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a [[Shapeshift]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

name: Wiccan
text: Response: After you play Wiccan from your hand, search your deck and discard pile for an identity-specific event and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)
flavor: "Hang on, Teddy! I got your back!"

name: Altman Residence
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Altman Residence → heal 2 damage from Teddy Altman and shuffle 1 Hulkling card from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Winged Shape
text: Hulkling gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, +1 DEF, and gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Winged Shape → remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Hulk Shape
text: Hulkling gets +2 ATK and +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Hulk Shape → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Armored Shape
text: Hulkling gets +1 ATK, +2 DEF, and gains retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Armored Shape → heal 2 damage from Hulkling.

name: Imitation Shape
text: Hulkling gets +2 THW. Forced Interrupt: When an enemy would attack you, it schemes instead. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Imitation Shape → draw 1 card.

name: Alien Physiology
text: Resource: Exhaust Alien Physiology → generate a [wild] resource ([wild] [wild] resources instead if paying for a Hulkling card).
flavor: "When I first discovered my powers, I thought I was a mutant. But it turns out I'm an alien!"

name: Shapeshifter Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Ready your [[Shapeshift]] upgrade.
flavor: "You don't touch my friends!" —Hulkling

name: Armored Defense
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, deal damage to it equal to your DEF. After this attack, give Hulkling a tough status card.

name: Impersonation
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, you may change to alter-ego form.
flavor: "I'm the Young Avengers' resident shape-changer." —Hulkling

name: Shapeshifter
text: Hero Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a [[Shapeshift]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)
flavor: "Didn't see that coming, did you?" —Hulkling

name: Patriot
text: Response: After you engage a minion, give Patriot a tough status card.
flavor: "I'm ready for anything."

name: Hidden Base
text: Uses (3 stronghold counters). Alter-Ego Response: After you change form, exhaust Hidden Base and remove 1 stronghold counter from it → give your identity a tough status card.

name: Excelsior
text: Restricted. (Max 2 restricted cards per player.) Response: After your hero defends against an enemy attack, spend a [energy] resource → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Defensive Conditioning
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
You get +3 hit points and your hero gets +1 DEF.

name: "I Can Do This All Day"
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, declare your hero as the defender without exhausting them.

flavor: "Is that all you got?" —Captain America

name: Cuts Both Ways
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, you gain retaliate 1 until the end of the phase.
flavor: "Two can play that game!" —Wiccan

name: Iron Lad
text: [star] Interrupt: When Iron Lad uses a basic power, exhaust another [[Avenger]] ally you control → add that ally's matching power to Iron Lad's power for this use.
flavor: "We became Young Avengers for a reason."

name: The Futurist
text: Action: Your Iron Man leader schemes. Do not give him a boost card for this activation.
flavor: "Steve's thinking is stuck in the past. This is the future, whether he likes it or not." —Iron Man

name: Target Lock
text: Action: Your Iron Man leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [mental] resource to pay for this event, choose an attachment on the enemy leader with the text "Hero Response" or "Hero Interrupt" and discard it.

name: High-Tech Suit
text: Attach to your Iron Man leader. Counts as a [[Tech]] attachment. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] resources → discard this card. Any player may trigger this ability.

name: Suit Up
text: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, give your Iron Man leader a tough status card.

name: Provoked Response
text: Forced Interrupt: When the enemy leader would attack you, it attacks your Captain Marvel leader instead. She cannot take more than 3 damage from this attack. Discard this card.

name: You Started This
text: Action: Your Captain Marvel leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [energy] resource to pay for this event, confuse the enemy leader.
flavor: "You should've known this was coming!" —Captain Marvel

name: Alpha Flight Recruit
text: Attach to an ally. Response: After any number of energy counters are placed on your Captain Marvel leader's Energy Channel attachment, heal 1 damage from attached ally.

name: Raw Power
text: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, place 2 energy counters on your Captain Marvel leader's Energy Channel attachment.

name: No, You Move!
text: Forced Interrupt: When the enemy leader would attack you, attach Cap's Shield to your Captain America leader and resolve this attack against him instead. Discard this card.

name: Fighting Dirty
text: Action: Your Captain America leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [physical] resource to pay for this event, stun the enemy leader.
flavor: "Things are different this time. Now I'm fighting dirty." —Captain America

name: Recruited by Cap
text: Action: Choose a minion engaged with you and choose a player on the enemy team. That minion engages that player.
flavor: "We're glad to have you on our side." —Captain America

name: The People's Hero
text: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, give your Captain America leader a facedown boost card.

name: Double Agent
text: Action: Remove 2 threat from the main scheme. Place 2 threat on your leader's main scheme.
flavor: "When someone targets one of us, they answer to all of us." —Spider-Woman

name: Spider-Blast
text: Action: Your Spider-Woman leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [mental] resource to pay for this event, confuse the enemy leader.
flavor: "From now on Spider-Woman fights back!" —Spider-Woman

name: Hard to Hit
text: Attach to your Spider-Woman leader and give her a tough status card. Forced Response: After attached Spider-Woman resolves an attack, place 2 skill counters on her Finesse attachment. Discard this card.

name: Secret Contact
text: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, place 2 skill counters on your Spider-Woman leader's Finesse attachment.
